As for eyeliner, I think the higher end products do perform better. When I just started to do my makeup, I used the Maybelline gel eyeliner and it melted and literally copies the inner eyeliner to my bottom lash line then I looked like a panda. Then I tried the Miss Hana pencil liner and Dolly wink one it still smudges but not as bad as the Maybelline one. Now I use the Chanel waterproof eyeliner and it works really well, never had any problem with it.

But for liquid liner I think many Japanese brands do affordable liners, my personal drug store favorite is the Love Liner and my high-end choice would be the Tom Ford double ended one.

Hope it helps

As for eyeliner, I think the higher end products do perform better. When I just started to do my makeup, I used the Maybelline gel eyeliner and it melted and literally copies the inner eyeliner to my bottom lash line then I looked like a panda. Then I tried the Miss Hana pencil liner and Dolly wink one it still smudges but not as bad as the Maybelline one. Now I use the Chanel waterproof eyeliner and it works really well, never had any problem with it.

But for liquid liner I think many Japanese brands do affordable liners, my personal drug store favorite is the Love Liner and my high-end choice would be the Tom Ford double ended one.

Hope it helps
